item.title: SMULL Command Set
item.description: Inplay SMULL Command Set For Transparent Data Transmission # Introduction # IN618 is InPlayâ€™s SMULL SoC product which features synchronous multi-node low-latency protocol (SMULL) stack with 2.4Ghz frequency band RF radio and MCU system integrated. The device incorporates an InPlay SMULL radio and subsystem that contains the RF transceiver, baseband, PHY and link layer engines.The physical layer has the digital PHY and RF transceiver that transmits and receives GFSK packets at 2Mbps.
